name: Minus decendance: Before the event
description:
Story: Your name is Jack and you're the scientist who worked in the facility down in the underground. One day, thing went horribly wrong. All monsters broke out of their cell and you're the last one alive. You managed to make it to the elevator but it doesn't work until you press all the buttons. Find all the buttons and head back to the elevator while avoiding the monsters roaming around the facility to win.

This is a fangame based on a Roblox game called "Minus decendance" made by Vanilla Deluxe.

This game will keep having an update such as new maps, modes and monsters so recommend to follow this game so you won't miss anything.

Credits:

Kendall Weaver - Urban Night Skybox

Little Robot Sound Factory - Horror Sfx

Scott Cawthon - The owner of all soundtracks and some sound effects in the game

Pico (Discord user) - Goo lab map parts

Seldomly, Winterhasmemes, EquestrianIzzyy, Astropillow8, Atrixxxxxx, Neutravoidex - Their Roblox avatar for Identity disguise
